item.title: Mirth Connect - Cheat Sheet
item.description:
Defining a java object :

  • Create a java class

Example java code from MIRTH’s web site

package com.example;

public class JarTest {

    public String returnSomething() {
        return "Hello, World!";
    }
}

  • Create a jar file.

  • Call java code from MIRTH

var obj = new Packages.com.example.JarTest();
logger.info(obj.returnSomething());
Reading Segments in HL7
	for each (seg in msg.children()){
    	if(seg.name() == "OBX")
        {
        	var result_date = seg['OBX.14']['OBX.14.1'].toString();
        }
    }
item.dc:creator: Emre Ermisoglu

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
About myself

Emre Ermisoglu is an Applications Systems Analyst / Programmer at University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences(UAMS). Emre has a Bacholor’s degree in 'Computer Science And Engineering' from Sabanci University,Turkey. Also He has Master’s degree in 'Computer Science' and 'Bioinformatics' from University of Arkansas at Little Rock (UALR), USA. He is currently pursuing a PhD degree in Bioinformatics.

Personal Website : http://www.emreermisoglu.com/
item.dc:creator: Emre Ermisoglu
